characters: Driver of a black SUV, driver of a white sedan, driver of a black car
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a multi-lane urban road. The traffic is moderate with vehicles moving steadily. A black SUV is directly ahead, a white sedan is in the adjacent left lane, and a black car is in the adjacent right lane. The black car on the right appears to be moving closer to the observer vehicles lane.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed and lane position, keeping a safe distance from the black SUV ahead. The vehicle is vigilant as the black car on the right shows signs of potentially merging into the observer vehicles lane.
key_objects: 1) Front: A black SUV, approximately 10 meters away, moving steadily. 2) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 15 meters away, moving steadily. 3) Right side: A black car, approximately 5 meters away, moving closer to the observer vehicles lane.
